author: Natasha Mascarenhas
title: Hio wants to put networking events back on your remote-only calendars
description: The Center for Disease Control (CDC) guidelines and the COVID-19 pandemic has surged event cancellations across the country. Tech workforces have found ways to stay productive: back-to-back Zoom calls, work-from-home happy hours and more Twitter threads than …
